SEARCH
Package eu.sternbauer.EtlGenerator.Generation.service

Class GenerationService

java.lang.Object
eu.sternbauer.EtlGenerator.Generation.service.GenerationService
@Service public class GenerationService extends Object
Generates SQL script files from the information stored inside the KnowledgeBase. It considers linked servers, correct join ordering, where conditions, selects and insert columns. It will produce a file with the source name and place on the file system, which can be executed on a SQL server.

  • Method Details

    • generateEtlLoadingStatements

      public String generateEtlLoadingStatements(String sourceName)
      Generates ETL statements to load from a given source to specified data target.
      Parameters:
      sourceName - Name of the source database.
      Returns:
      Path to the generated script file

    • findFullLayoutByDatabaseName

      private List<FullLayoutElement> findFullLayoutByDatabaseName(String dbName)
      Finds all tables and columns inside the KnowledgeBase for a given database name and transforms the entries.
      Parameters:
      dbName - Name of the database for which the layout items should be generated
      Returns:
      A list of FullLayoutElement elements which do all belong the the same database under the passed name

    • findElementWithTable

      private FullLayoutElement findElementWithTable(List<FullLayoutElement> elements, int tableId)
      Finds the first table element with a given ID from the list of layout elements.
      Parameters:
      elements - Elements which are searched
      tableId - The relevant table ID
      Returns:
      A FullLayoutElement with the table ID or null, if no table with said ID is found.

    • findJoins

      private Queue<JoinFinder> findJoins(List<FullLayoutElement> srcElements, Map<Integer,FullLayoutElement> colIdToElement)
      Finds all joins from the list of layout elements by accessing all column IDs and then extracting the join information.
      Parameters:
      srcElements - Elements for which the joins should be found
      colIdToElement - A mapping from column IDs to layout elements
      Returns:
      A Queue, typically implemented as a LinkedList, will all found Joins in the form of JoinFinder

    • createLinkedServerStatements

      private String createLinkedServerStatements(DatabaseConfig config)
      Generates the linked server statements, using available configs from application.properties.
      Parameters:
      config - DatabaseConfig read from the application.properties file
      Returns:
      String containing the linked server statements plus authentification.

    • concatJoinCondition

      private String concatJoinCondition(Map<Integer,FullLayoutElement> colIdToElement, KBJoinTableDTO join)
      Handles the mapping of join condition elements, to replace the placeholder name with the actual shortcode + column name
      Parameters:
      colIdToElement - Mapping of columns to elements
      join - The join for which the mapping is handled.
      Returns:
      The mapping string with table shortcodes and column names instead of the placeholders.

    • concatTableSelect

      private StringBuilder concatTableSelect(Map<Integer,FullLayoutElement> colIdToElement, FullLayoutElement t1Elem)
      Handles the mapping ofo custom table select elements, replace the placeholder name with the actual shortcode + column name
      Parameters:
      colIdToElement - Mapping of columns to elements
      t1Elem - layout element which has a custom select on the table element.
      Returns:
      a StringBuilder with the mapping, containing table shortcodes and column names instead of the placeholders.

    • generateShortcodesForTables

      private void generateShortcodesForTables(List<FullLayoutElement> elements)
      Generates shortcodes for each table. To avoid duplicated names that could result in errors, it looks into the already existing names and adds one additional character from the table name. If the whole name is already taken, the process will start repeating the table name character by character until a suitable shortcode is found.
      Parameters:
      elements - A list of layout elements which need their shortcuts set.
